name: palmy
content:
palmy adjective
(TREES)
Add to word list
Add to word list
having a lot of palm trees: They retired and relocated to the palmy pastures of Florida. His work took him from barren Texas to palmy California.

palmy adjective
(MONEY/SUCCESS)
having a lot of money and success: Back in the palmier days of the company, employees would be given an annual holiday bonus. It was a living, but not the same kind of success he had enjoyed in the palmy days.
